form.PN:
Kadar je beseda
sow
glagol, jo izgovarjamo
/s*@*U/
, kadar je samostalnik, pa
/s*a*U/
.

sense.def:
To sow seeds
ali
to sow an area of land with seeds
pomeni, da na nekem območju položimo seme v zemljo.

seg.quote: You can sow winter wheat in October.
The land was cleared of weeds and sown with grass.

sense.def:
To sow an undesirable feeling among people
pomeni sprožiti nezaželene občutke v ljudeh;

seg.quote: She attacked those who sow dismay and division in the party.

sense.def:
A sow
je odrasla samica prašiča.
